1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | XML tree.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Subtree.Xml
6  ( -- * XML token
7    XmlToken (..),
8    XmlTerm,
9    XmlKey (..),
10    xmlTokens,
11
12    -- * XML tree
13    XmlTree,
14    xmlTrees,
15    xmlDecode,
16
17    -- * Conversion
18    XmlTreeOutput,
19    RawJudge,
20    xmlSubtree,
21    xmlData,
22    xmlSubtreeData,
23  ) where
24
25import qualified Text.HTML.TagSoup                       as X
26import qualified Text.StringLike                         as X
27import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture                as O
28import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                    as B
29import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Symbol           as S
30import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Subtree.Subtree  as S
31
32
33-- ============================================  XML token
34
35-- | XML token.
36data XmlToken s
37    = XmlOpen  s            -- ^ Open tag
38    | XmlClose s            -- ^ Close tag
39    | XmlTerm (XmlTerm s)   -- ^ Terminal token
40      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
41
42instance B.GetCodePos (XmlToken s) where
43    getCP  _ = B.def
44    getCPs _ = []
45
46-- | Terminal of XML tree.
47type XmlTerm s = (XmlKey s, s)
48
49-- | Key data of XML tree.
50data XmlKey s
51    = XmlElem s       -- ^ Element node
52    | XmlAttr s       -- ^ Attribute of element
53    | XmlText         -- ^ Text node
54    | XmlComment      -- ^ Comment node
55      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
56
57-- | Tokenize XML document.
58--
59--   >>> xmlTokens "<hello>wonderful</world>"
60--   [XmlOpen "hello", XmlTerm (XmlText, "wonderful"), XmlClose "hello"]
61--
62--   >>> xmlTokens "<a x='xx' y='yy'>"
63--   [XmlOpen "a", XmlTerm (XmlAttr "x", "xx"), XmlTerm (XmlAttr "y", "yy"), XmlClose "a"]
64--
65xmlTokens :: (X.StringLike s) => s -> [XmlToken s]
66xmlTokens = convertTags . X.parseTags
67
68convertTags :: (X.StringLike s) => [X.Tag s] -> [XmlToken s]
69convertTags = loop [] where
70    loop up (X.TagOpen n xs : tags) = XmlOpen n : ((attr <$> xs)
71                                                   ++ loop (n : up) tags)
72    loop (u : up) tags'@(X.TagClose n : tags)
73                       | u == n     = XmlClose n   : loop up tags
74                       | otherwise  = XmlClose u   : loop up tags'
75    loop up (X.TagText s    : tags) = XmlTerm (XmlText, s) : loop up tags
76    loop up (X.TagComment s : tags) = XmlTerm (XmlComment, s) : loop up tags
77    loop up (_              : tags) = loop up tags
78    loop up []                      = XmlClose <$> up
79
80    attr (n, v) = XmlTerm (XmlAttr n, v)
81
82
83-- ============================================  XML tree
84
85-- | XML tree.
86type XmlTree s = S.Subtree (XmlTerm s)
87
88type XmlTree' s = B.CodeTree (XmlTerm s) (XmlToken s)
89
90-- | Convert XML tokens to XML tree.
91xmlTrees :: (Ord s, X.StringLike s) => [XmlToken s] -> B.Ab [XmlTree s]
92xmlTrees toks =
93    do trees <- B.codeTrees bracket B.BracketNone toks
94       Right (modifyTree <$> trees)
95    where
96      bracket (XmlOpen n)   = B.BracketOpen  (XmlElem n, n)
97      bracket (XmlClose n)  = B.BracketClose (XmlElem n, n)
98      bracket _             = B.BracketNone
99
100modifyTree :: (X.StringLike s) => XmlTree' s -> XmlTree s
101modifyTree = B.treeMap (const []) y xmlUntoken where
102    y (Just (t, _))  = xmlUntoken t
103    y _              = (XmlComment, X.empty)
104
105xmlUntoken :: XmlToken s -> XmlTerm s
106xmlUntoken (XmlOpen  n) = (XmlElem n, n)
107xmlUntoken (XmlClose n) = (XmlElem n, n)
108xmlUntoken (XmlTerm  z) = z
109
110-- | Decode XML trees.
111--
112--   >>> B.printTrees =<< B.abortLeft (xmlDecode "<hello>wonderful</world>")
113--   > () (XmlElem "hello","hello")
114--     - (XmlText,"wonderful")
115--
116--   >>> B.printTrees =<< B.abortLeft (xmlDecode "<a x='xx' y='yy'>")
117--   > () (XmlElem "a","a")
118--     - (XmlAttr "x","xx")
119--     - (XmlAttr "y","yy")
120--
121xmlDecode :: (Ord s, X.StringLike s) => s -> B.Ab [XmlTree s]
122xmlDecode = xmlTrees . xmlTokens
123
124
125-- ============================================  Conversion
126
127-- | XML output tree.
128type XmlTreeOutput s = S.SubtreeOutput (XmlTerm s)
129
130-- | Judgement material.
131type RawJudge c = (S.JudgeClass, [S.Term c])
132
133-- | Calculate subtree of XML tree.
134xmlSubtree :: [S.SubtreePattern] -> [XmlTree String] -> [XmlTreeOutput String]
135xmlSubtree = S.subtreeWith xmlKeyString
136
137xmlKeyString :: XmlTerm String -> String
138xmlKeyString (XmlElem s  , _) = s
139xmlKeyString (XmlAttr s  , _) = s
140xmlKeyString (XmlText    , _) = "@text"
141xmlKeyString (XmlComment , _) = "@comment"
142
143-- | Extract data from XML output tree.
144xmlData :: XmlTreeOutput String -> [RawJudge O.Value]
145xmlData = S.subtreeData . xmlValue
146
147xmlValue :: XmlTreeOutput String -> S.SubtreeOutput O.Value
148xmlValue = snd . loop 1 where
149    loop i (B.TreeL z)      = (i + 1, B.TreeL (value i z))
150    loop i (B.TreeB b y xs) = let (i', xs') = branch (i + 1) [] xs
151                              in (i', B.TreeB b (value i y) xs')
152
153    value _ (S.SubtreeNone, _)            = (S.SubtreeNone, O.VEmpty)
154    value _ (S.SubtreeText cs n, (_, s))  = (S.SubtreeText cs n, O.VStr $ O.trimBoth s)
155    value i (S.SubtreeSeq  cs n, _)       = (S.SubtreeSeq  cs n, O.VInt i)
156
157    branch i xs' [] = (i, reverse xs')
158    branch i xs' (x : xs) = case loop i x of
159                              (i', x') -> branch i' (x' : xs') xs
160
161-- | Calculate XML subtree and extract data.
162xmlSubtreeData :: [S.SubtreePattern] -> [XmlTree String] -> [RawJudge O.Value]
163xmlSubtreeData ps ts = xmlData O.<++> xmlSubtree ps ts
